### Idiom: 挂羊头，卖狗肉
### Meaning: 挂着羊头，卖的却是狗肉。比喻以好的名义做招牌，实际上兜售低劣的货色。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by gpt4; Corpus: web
source: 淀粉(豌豆)问题在于传统的“挂羊头，卖狗肉”勾当，当前食品中不断的暴光内容，使平民百姓难以放心：猫肉烤出的羊肉串、满室飘香的牛肉精、“秘传”的调料、火锅底、甚至完整鸡蛋中出现染色的蛋黄、会爆炸的西瓜、避孕药处理的黄瓜，如此层出不穷的绝顶手段，使人们不能不百生疑虑。
target: The problem with starch (peas) lies in the traditional "sheep's head sold as dog meat" trick, where the constant exposure of the current food content makes it hard for ordinary people to feel at ease: cat meat roasted as lamb skewers, beef essence with a room full of fragrance, "secret recipe" seasonings, hot pot base, even dyed yolks appearing in whole eggs, exploding watermelons, cucumbers treated with contraceptive pills, such endless extreme methods make people inevitably filled with doubts.

target: He gave birth to two eldest sons, Yao Xuan and second son Yao De. In the year of Xuanhe Jiachen of Song Dynasty (1124), he was promoted to Jinshi in the Honghui List, second in the imperial promotion of Tingcheng, Shangshu of the Ministry of Etiquette, and Bachelor of Longtuge. He was given the first rank as a disciple of the Crown Prince. He was an astronomer of the Southern Song Dynasty and was promoted to the sun and the moon. When crossing the food, consider the increase and decrease of the five latitudes to mark the period of cold and heat. He wrote one volume each of "Calendar", "Almanac" and "Five-Star Test".

source: 洪秀全当众说道：“洪某到贵省来，不过为传播道理，别无他意。非是洪某好事，实是事势不得不如此也！”各人听罢，皆大呼道：“人生在世，那有不爱身家性命？愿听洪先生指挥！”当下众口齐声，声如雷动。谁想虎狼官吏，不能捕盗安民，反来攻击诸君。
target: Hong Xiuquan said in front of everyone: "Hong came to your province just to spread the truth and had no other intention. It's not Hong's good deeds, but the situation has to be like this!" After everyone heard this, they all shouted: "Life is here. , then don’t you love your wealth and life? Are you willing to listen to Mr. Hong’s command!” At that moment, everyone shouted in unison, the sound was like thunder. Who would have thought that the tiger and wolf officials could not arrest and rob the people, but would instead attack the kings?

source: 记得有半卡板的桶装蒸馏水，原先打算用唧车运上货车。不过，数名热心山友不知就里便用上蚂蚁搬家的方式，将部分蒸馏水运上货车。他们还想到个较轻松的运水方法，将一桶桶蒸馏水打横放在地上，再慢慢滚去货车旁，既节省臂力又好玩。
target: I remember there was half a pallet of distilled water in barrels, which was originally planned to be transported to the truck by a handcart. However, several enthusiastic mountain friends unknowingly used the method of ants moving house, and transported part of the distilled water to the truck. They also came up with a more relaxed way to transport water, by placing the barrels of distilled water sideways on the ground and slowly rolling them to the side of the truck, which not only saved arm strength but also was fun.

source: 会否自立门户签新人？坤哥说：‘不会了，都未管理好自己，宁愿将毕生功力传授开去，作育英才，开始有些同事蔡洁、江嘉敏都提出来上课。’他笑言专收‘魔音’学生，知道无线蕴藏好多‘魔音’，包括李佳芯、冯盈盈、郭柏妍等，好欢迎教她们唱歌，‘有教无类，唱歌最紧要基本技巧和感情，我唱了10几年，有些经验和心得，只要大家肯学就得，会努力将不可能变有可能，证明自己实力’。爱雀受欢迎 Toby启发商机。

At first, some colleagues Cai Jie and Jiang Jiamin proposed to take classes." He said with a smile that he specializes in recruiting students with "magic voices". He knows that Wireless has many "magic voices", including Li Jiaxin, Feng Yingying, Guo Baiyan, etc., so he welcomes them to teach them singing. I have been singing for more than 10 years, and I have some experience and insights. As long as everyone is willing to learn, they will work hard to make the impossible possible and prove their own strength.' The popularity of Toby inspires business opportunities.

### Idiom: 言有尽而意无穷
### Meaning: 指诗文含义深刻，令人品味不尽。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by gpt4; Corpus: wikipedia
source: 晚唐时流行的一部说诗杂著《琉璃堂墨客图》，尊称王昌龄为“诗天子”。南宋严羽认为王昌龄诗可说是透彻玲珑，无迹可求，言有尽而意无穷。明清时的诗评家推许《出塞》其一（秦时明月汉时关）为唐人七绝的压卷之作，是唐代七绝第一。
target: A popular anthology of poetry during the late Tang Dynasty, "The Ink Guest Picture of the Glass Hall", honored Wang Changling as the "Poetry Emperor". Yan Yu of the Southern Song Dynasty believed that Wang Changling's poetry could be described as thoroughly exquisite, leaving no trace to be found, with words that are finite but meanings that are infinite. Poetry critics during the Ming and Qing Dynasties highly praised "Out of the Fortress" (The moon of the Qin Dynasty and the Han Dynasty's pass) as the masterpiece of the Tang Dynasty's seven-character quatrain, ranking it as the best of the Tang Dynasty's seven-character quatrains.

### Idiom: 阮囊羞涩
### Meaning: 阮囊亚代阮孚的钱袋；羞涩难为情。比喻经济困难。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by qwen-14b-chat; Corpus: cc-news
source: 玉米辰为了创作，长时间与专家学者一起记录各种动植物生态，与NGO工作者一同培训，许多作品都是厚积薄发的成果。木田工场过去曾从3人组织扩增到13个人，如今又回到3人，自嘲对家里的贡献趋近于零，仍一股脑儿的画出对台湾土地的爱，即便阮囊羞涩也不改其志。2021年玉米辰《守护大海的人》因交通部首长更换而遭销毁2,000多本跃上新闻版面，随后却荣获2021年Open book好书奖和2022年世界插画大奖的肯定，让世界看见了台湾。
target: Taiwanese illustrator and author Yu Ming-Chen has spent a long time with experts and scholars to record the ecology of various plants and animals, and has trained with NGO workers in order to create. Many of his works are the result of accumulated effort. The Workshop of Wood has grown from a three-person organization to a 13-person one, and has now shrunk back to three. Yu Ming-Chen jokes that his contributions to the family are close to zero, but he has not changed his determination to paint his love for Taiwan's land, even if his pockets are empty. In 2021, Yu Ming-Chen's "The People Who Protect the Sea" was destroyed after the replacement of the head of the Ministry of Transportation, with more than 2,000 copies making headlines. However, it was later awarded the 2021 Open Book Award and the 2022 World Illustration Award, allowing the world to see Taiwan.

"Wang Qingfeng was very excited, even trying to give them money until he was stopped by the police," Ji Huirong recalled. "But they hated us, looking at me with cold eyes - filled with resentment." She stared at me with wide eyes, her right hand covering her chest. "I know, especially because - I am a woman."

source: 会否自立门户签新人？坤哥说：‘不会了，都未管理好自己，宁愿将毕生功力传授开去，作育英才，开始有些同事蔡洁、江嘉敏都提出来上课。’他笑言专收‘魔音’学生，知道无线蕴藏好多‘魔音’，包括李佳芯、冯盈盈、郭柏妍等，好欢迎教她们唱歌，‘有教无类，唱歌最紧要基本技巧和感情，我唱了10几年，有些经验和心得，只要大家肯学就得，会努力将不可能变有可能，证明自己实力’。爱雀受欢迎 Toby启发商机。
target: In the future, would he be able to recruit new members? Kunko said: "No, I'll just go to raise a new generation of talent, teaching '魔音' students, knowing that the radio contains a lot of '魔音', like Li Jie, Peng Yingying, and Guo Baiyun. "I'll really try to make the impossible possible, prove my ability."

context:
### Idiom: 白眼相看
### Meaning: 看别人时眼睛朝上或旁边，现出白眼珠，表示轻蔑，不屑一顾，对人不礼貌。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by mt0-13b; Corpus: weibo
source: 八大山人的鸟画，逸笔草草，常常一幅画就一二小鸟，单足而立，紧缩脖子，白眼相看，露出一幅不屑的傲娇表情，以此表达作者悲愤不已的心情。八大山人笔下的鸟雀并不只有瞟白眼，有的鸟儿给人感觉在静穆沉思，有的在倚梦安睡，有的作洗耳恭听状，整个画面传达出一片宁静的氛围，给人无限的想象空间。
target: The paintings of the birds by the eighth mountains are often a single painting of one or two small birds, stiff neck, looking each other in a mocking expression, to express the author's angry mood. The birds in the paintings of the eighth mountains do not only look each other in a mocking expression, some birds seem to be silently reflecting, some lying down dreaming, some making a loud noise, the whole image transmits a quiet atmosphere, giving infinite imagination.

### Meaning: 神志昏沉，不省人事。同昏迷不醒”。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by mt0-13b; Corpus: wikipedia
source: 至中午12时许，卫生署人员到场接走老翁，送他返回蓝田寓所继续接受家居隔离。2022年1月4日，清平楼一名女户主返回住所后，发现22岁女儿房间上锁，其后强行人房后发现已经昏迷不省人事。。而救护员亦在房间内发现另一名20岁已经失去知觉的女子，经检查后，证实两名女子当场身亡。
target: At around 12:00, a health authority officer arrived to pick up the elderly man, and sent him back to the Blue Tate apartment to continue his home quarantine. On January 4, a resident of the Qingping apartment went home after her 22-year-old daughter was locked in the room, and after breaking into the room she was unconscious, and a medical officer also found another 20-year-old woman unconscious in the room, and after examination the two women were confirmed dead on the spot.

### Idiom: 生死攸关
### Meaning: 谓关系到生存或死亡。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by alma-13b-lora; Corpus: web
source: 当疯狂的战役机终究刹住车的时候，距离身旁的那架客机只有约9米远。由于机身携带有易燃的外挂油箱和2枚激光制导的导弹，起火的飞机随时可能产生剧烈爆炸！生死攸关之际，他按下了“太空时期”火箭弹射椅的按钮。多年的飞行经验告知他，现在已到了人机分离的决策临界点。
target: At the moment the wild battle machine finally stopped, the distance between the aircraft was about 9 meters. Since the aircraft carried inflammable external fuel tanks and two laser-guided missiles, the aircraft could explode violently at any time! At the critical moment of life and death, he pressed the button of the space age rocket ejector. His years of flying experience told him that the time had come to make a decision to separate from the aircraft.

**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

source: 在展览“时闻时事”板块，两幅“强夺公所，法人残忍”的图片描写的正是“四明公所事件”；《痌瘝在抱》则聚焦甲午战争表达了强烈的抗日情怀；而《车夫仗义》《好行其德》等讲述了当时人与人之间的温情故事。
target: In the "Current Events" section of the exhibition, two pictures titled "Seizing the Public Office, Cruelty of the Legal Person" precisely depict the "Siming Public Office Incident". "Tong Guan in Arms" focuses on the Sino-Japanese War of 1894-1895, expressing strong anti-Japanese sentiments. Meanwhile, "Charioteer's Righteousness" and "Good Conduct" narrate warm stories of interpersonal relationships of the time.

source: 在《破晓》中和彼得一起帮库伦家族做证。被维多利亚转化为吸血鬼，后来因爱上维多利亚而甘心为她卖力组织并领导新生吸血鬼团队，在与库伦家族的战役中被化身为狼的赛斯杀死，死前明白了维多利亚其实是虚情假意。登场于《蚀》和《布莉的重生》中的吸血鬼，没有特殊能力。
target: In "Dawn", help the Cullen family testify together with Peter. Transformed into a vampire by Victoria, later willing to devote himself to organizing and leading the new vampire team for her because of his love for Victoria. He was killed by Seth, who had been transformed into a werewolf, in the battle against the Cullen family. He understood that Victoria was actually insincere before he died. A vampire appearing in "Eclipse" and "Bella's Reborn", has no special ability.

### Idiom: 身家性命
### Meaning: 全家的生命和财产。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by alma-13b-lora; Corpus: web
source: 洪秀全当众说道：“洪某到贵省来，不过为传播道理，别无他意。非是洪某好事，实是事势不得不如此也！”各人听罢，皆大呼道：“人生在世，那有不爱身家性命？愿听洪先生指挥！”当下众口齐声，声如雷动。谁想虎狼官吏，不能捕盗安民，反来攻击诸君。
target: Hong Xiuquan said in public: "Hong has come to your province, and he has only come to spread the truth. It is not Hong's good deed, but he has no choice but to do so. " After listening, everyone shouted: "Is there anyone who does not love his family, his life, and his property while he is alive? We are willing to listen to Hong's instructions!" The crowd responded with a loud roar. Who would have thought that tigers and wolves, those officials, would not be able to catch thieves and protect the people, but would instead attack you, gentlemen.

source: 目睹儿子面露愧色，母亲接着说，“你们要牢记父亲生前的教诲，恪守‘清慎勤’的为官之道，永葆清风峻节，尤其不能滋长一丝一毫的贪欲！”
target: Seeing her son's expression of shame, the mother continued, "You must remember your father's teachings during his lifetime, abide by the 'pure, careful and diligent' way of serving as an official, always maintain a clean and honest manner, and especially not breed even a trace of greed!"

### Idiom: 富贵不能淫
### Meaning: 富贵旧指有钱财、有地位；淫迷惑。指意志不为金钱和地位所迷惑。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by mt0-13b; Corpus: web
source: 豪族儒家喜欢讲个"富而好礼"、特别重视嫡庶宗亲之间的对各种权力的分配之义--他们老婆儿子一大堆，又有土地名器爵位可以传承嘛！"富贵不能淫"主要是说给这些老兄们听的。
target: The aristocratic 儒家 like to talk about "富而好礼", especially emphasizing the importance of the various power distributions between their relatives - they have a lot of wife and children and lots of land and noble positions to inherit! "富贵不能淫" was mainly told to those old men.
